author: lukaszrozmej
content: <@194432762315407360> can you check if geth is folowing the standard of https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/600 in `eth_createAccessList`? There is no hive test for it and we are not sure about it.

content: will ping you with my feedback  when we make comparision between geth and neth performance, we don't have provability now but I think we can have order of magnitude better perf.
